messages.stories.scrollarea.argTypes.snapType.des:
Controls scroll snap behavior using CSS scroll-snap-type. **Directions**: 'x' (horizontal), 'y' (vertical), 'both' (both axes), 'none' (disable). **Strictness**: 'mandatory' forces snap to closest point, 'proximity' snaps only when near. **Examples**: 'y mandatory' for vertical carousel (always snaps), 'x proximity' for horizontal gallery (snaps when near). 

**Child Item Classes**: Apply these Tailwind classes to child elements to control snap alignment:
• `snap-start` - Snap to the start edge of the item
• `snap-center` - Snap to the center of the item
• `snap-end` - Snap to the end edge of the item
• `snap-align-none` - Disable snap for specific item

messages.stories.upload.argTypes.listType.descrip: Type of file list display: text (simple list), picture (thumbnail + info), picture-card (grid)
messages.stories.resizable.argTypes.direction.des: Direction of the resizable panels (horizontal or vertical)
messages.stories.resizable.argTypes.panels.descri: Configuration array for panels when using wrapper mode. Each panel can have defaultSize, minSize, maxSize, collapsible settings
messages.stories.resizable.argTypes.withHandle.de: Show handle with grip icon for easier dragging
messages.stories.resizable.argTypes.autoSaveId.de: ID to auto-save layout to localStorage. Layout will be restored on page reload
messages.stories.resizable.argTypes.onLayout.desc: Callback function called when panel sizes change
messages.stories.resizable.argTypes.className.des: Additional CSS classes for the panel group container
messages.stories.resizable.argTypes.panelClassNam: Additional CSS classes applied to each panel
messages.stories.resizable.argTypes.handleClassNa: Additional CSS classes for resize handles
messages.stories.resizable.argTypes.keyboardResiz: Percentage to resize by when using keyboard (default: 10)
messages.stories.resizable.argTypes.handleVariant: Handle variant: 'default' shows grip icon, 'line' highlights the border on hover
messages.stories.resizable.argTypes.handleIcon.de: Custom icon for the handle (only works with default variant)
